head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SWANSON, DAVID W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SWANSON, DAVID W.

block.p: SWANSON--David W., Williamstown, MA, died April 23. Born in Brooklyn to Robert and Ruby (Jones) Swanson, graduated from Poly Prep High School and Williams College. Owner of James W. Elwell Shipping Company in NY. First wife, Mary Flanagan Swanson, second wife, Tracey MacGruer Swanson, both deceased. Loving father of Judith Redway, Janet Stewart and David W. Swanson, Jr. Memorial service will take place at a later date at St. John's Church, Williamstown, MA. Burial in Greenwood Cemetery, Brooklyn, NY. Donations St. John's Church or Williams College through the Flynn & Dagnoli Funeral Home, 521 W. Main St., North Adams, MA 01247
